channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro: New Design Echoed In Latest Leak
item.description: There’s a different design element coming to the Pro iPhones this fall: a new color that has just been named and shown in a new leak.

item.title: Anonymity and Bugs Bunny
item.description: I came across this (ironically) anonymous quote recently: “The offline world is full of sticks, but the internet only has carrots.” When we come toget...

item.title: ‘Doomsday Glacier’ May Not Melt As Quickly As Feared—But It’s Still Disappearing Fast, Study Finds
item.description: Scientists previously predicted the glacier will cause global sea levels to rise three feet by 2070 and 50 feet by 2300, though the new study suggests...

item.title: Non-professional writers
item.description: Nobody asks you to design a bridge, write a sonnet or do open heart surgery. We leave these essential tasks to trained professionals. But many job des...

item.title: Does Harris Have A Plan For US Crypto And Blockchain Industries?
item.description: Investing in sound policies to foster the growth of innovation industries is an idea that transcends partisanship. Kamala Harris should make that poin...

item.title: The prevailing conditions
item.description: It doesn’t matter how hard you try, you’re not going to change the direction of the wind. That doesn’t mean you can’t get good at sailing, though. And...

item.title: Celebrate 30 Years Of Board Game Chaos With Two New Robo Rally Titles
item.description: Robo Rally returns with a deluxe 30th Anniversary Edition and one featuring Autobots and Decepticons from the Transformers franchise.

item.title: How To Complete The Dragnet Quest In ‘Escape From Tarkov’
item.description: The new Dragnet quest in Escape From Tarkov has players stumped, but that’s because you need a completely new and very rare item to progress.

item.title: In defense of the hard parts
